body: my question is if in previous updates Avicus has already been tournaments, and if there has been, there will be more in? future?, as I think it could be a great project in pvp tournament Avicus

title: I have a question about Avicus

replies.body: There will be tournaments in the future, Ivy/funky is going to make the plugin for it in a while.
replies.body_tagged: There will be tournaments in the future, Ivy/funky is going to make the plugin for it in a while.

replies.body: Patience, when a tournament will happen, it will be announced on the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Patience, when a tournament will happen, it will be announced on the forums.

replies.body: There is already a tournament planned. It has been announced by ParaSpider. No information beyond there will be a tourney has been announced.
replies.body_tagged: There is already a tournament planned. It has been announced by ParaSpider. No information beyond there will be a tourney has been announced.

replies.body:
There was a tournament when MC Zone reached 500.000 players

Half of the forumers left that day
